text: insaan ko to jab koee buraee chhoo gayee bas vah laga hamase duaen maangane, phir jab ham use apanee taraf se koee neamat ata karate hain to kahane lagata hai ki ye to sirph (mere) ilm ke zor se mujhe diya gaya hai (ye galatee hai) balki ye to ek aazamaish hai magar un mein ke aksar nahin jaanate hain
